title: Use OpenClaw for free with Ollama
excerpt: I recently released ollama launch and a new TUI to make Ollama more usable.

title: Building Reliable AI Agents
excerpt: AI agents accomplish a task in a mostly unstructured manner – where they are able to reason and conduct actions to achieve a goal. The key is in providing just enough structure through tool design, harness design, and context engineering to guide the agent effectively.

title: Sampling and structured outputs in LLMs
excerpt: Sampling and structured outputs are tied together as they both determine the model’s next chosen token.
